text: enhanced north-south links. BACK TO CONTENTS z Development must provide public access along the waterfront at North Quay. Improved green grid connections should be delivered through the site and along the waterfront at North Dock, with good quality onward connections to green grid routes at the West India Docks and Hertsmere Road, and connecting to the Aspen Way and Billingsgate Market site allocations. Environment and public realm z Create a positive sense of place through the delivery of an active public square connecting the Canary Wharf Elizabeth line station and the dockside promenade to Poplar DLR station and Poplar High Street. z Across the South Poplar Masterplan area, development should coordinate to manage surface water to enable discharge into the docks to the south. 484 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS 4.9 Reuters Figure 51: 4.9 Reuters (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION
